text: @HawleyMO Good, after that,introduce a resolution to create a bipartisan committee to investigate how the Federal Gov has screwed the coronavirus response. First we were told it was a hoax, then media exaggeration and now everything is shut down and hospitals don’t have enough equipment.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
